title.narrative: Resilience Through Watershed Management, Risk Reduction and Development

description.narrative:
1) Develop partnerships with relevant departments and other professional institutions. Increased coordination and improved understanding of urban actors including government officials and community members on urban climate change and earthquake preparedness/risk reduction measures Reactivation of Dhaka North City Corporation Disaster Management Committee via meetings.
2) Increased Ecological Resilience in Urban Areas. Construction of a sewage treatment/water recycle facility. Eco-friendly infrastructure development.
3) Capacity-building trainings for specialized emergency response agencies. Capacity-building trainings for urban volunteers.
4) Reduced risk of fire and earthquake in selected garment factories through improved good Governance and private sector engagement. Stock-piling of emergency response materials. Development of emergency response plans. Outreach to the community most likely to be affected by a disaster

Decrease the vulnerability of the Dhaka population to natural disasters through the promotion and adoption of eco living practices via capacity building of state and non-state actors, awareness raising sessions for the local population and infrastructure improvements.
